body_html: This fix is not cross-compile correct (the build time constant has nothing to do with whether or not the runtime g++ will support it.) I'm OK with taking the patch anyway but we should say that it is not strictly correct, so if someone else runs into the problem they know that they can fix it.
body_text: This fix is not cross-compile correct (the build time constant has nothing to do with whether or not the runtime g++ will support it.) I'm OK with taking the patch anyway but we should say that it is not strictly correct, so if someone else runs into the problem they know that they can fix it.
body: This fix is not cross-compile correct (the *build* time constant has nothing to do with whether or not the *runtime* g++ will support it.) I'm OK with taking the patch anyway but we should say that it is not strictly correct, so if someone else runs into the problem they know that they can fix it.
